languages.text: "И был{mf||а} чертовски прав{mf||а}. Но мне всегда говорили, что у меня особо толстая лобная кость. Оказывается, это — не всегда преимущество".
"And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."
languages.original_text: "И был{mf||а} чертовски прав{mf||а}. Но мне всегда говорили, что у меня особо толстая лобная кость. Оказывается, это — не всегда преимущество".

traits.locale_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."
"And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."
"And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."
"And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."
"And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."

languages.text: 「それに、あなたの言ったことはまったくその通りでした。ですが、私は昔から、とびきり頑固だって言われてきたんです。どうやら、それは必ずしも良いことではなかったようです」
languages.original_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、あなたの言ったことはまったくその通りでした。ですが、私は昔から、とびきり頑固だって言われてきたんです。どうやら、それは必ずしも良いことではなかったようです」

languages.text: "Und Ihr hattet verdammt recht. Aber mir wurde stets gesagt, ich hätte einen besonders dicken Schädel. Wie sich herausgestellt hat, ist das nicht notwendigerweise etwas Gutes."
languages.original_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr hattet verdammt recht. Aber mir wurde stets gesagt, ich hätte einen besonders dicken Schädel. Wie sich herausgestellt hat, ist das nicht notwendigerweise etwas Gutes."

languages.text: « Et vous aviez raison. Mais on m'a toujours dit que j'avais la tête dure. Et en fin de compte, il s'avère que ce n'est pas toujours une bonne chose. »
languages.original_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous aviez raison. Mais on m'a toujours dit que j'avais la tête dure. Et en fin de compte, il s'avère que ce n'est pas toujours une bonne chose. »

languages.text: «Y tenía toda la razón. Pero siempre me han dicho que tengo una cabeza especialmente dura. Y resulta que eso no siempre es bueno».
languages.original_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."

traits.locale_text: «Y tenía toda la razón. Pero siempre me han dicho que tengo una cabeza especialmente dura. Y resulta que eso no siempre es bueno».

languages.text: “你说的真是太他妈对了。总有人说我笨头笨脑，而事实证明，脑子笨未必是好事。”
languages.original_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."

traits.locale_text: “你说的真是太他妈对了。总有人说我笨头笨脑，而事实证明，脑子笨未必是好事。”

languages.text: "Haklılığı gördüm. Kalın kafalı olduğumu söylerlerdi, meğer bu iyi bir şey değilmiş."
languages.original_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki haklıydınız. Lakin kalın kafalı olduğum söylenir, meğer bu iyi bir şey değilmiş."

languages.original_text: "And you were bloody right. But I've always been told I have an especially thick skull. As it turns out, that isn't necessarily a good thing."
